from TBL_SKU_STORE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_SKU_STORE (STORE_ID, SKU_NO, CHANNEL_ID, MARKET_PRICE, REGULAR_PRICE, POS_AMT, AVG_COST, SKU_STATUS, ALLOW_RETURN, HOLD_ORDER, EVENT_NO, PROM_EVENT_NO, STAMP_EVENT_NO, DISPLAY_FLAG, MD_SELECTION, PROMOTION, FUTURE_PROMOTION, STORE_SELECTION, POG_FLAG, MODIFY_TIME, ALLOW_SALES ) values (#{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{regularPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{posAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{avgCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{skuStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{holdOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promEventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stampEventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdSelection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promotion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{futurePromotion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeSelection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pogFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{allowSales,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update TBL_SKU_STORE
STORE_ID = #{row.storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_NO = #{row.skuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_ID = #{row.channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET_PRICE = #{row.marketPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
REGULAR_PRICE = #{row.regularPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
POS_AMT = #{row.posAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
AVG_COST = #{row.avgCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

EVENT_NO = #{row.eventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROM_EVENT_NO = #{row.promEventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAMP_EVENT_NO = #{row.stampEventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_FLAG = #{row.displayFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MD_SELECTION = #{row.mdSelection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROMOTION = #{row.promotion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUTURE_PROMOTION = #{row.futurePromotion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_SELECTION = #{row.storeSelection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POG_FLAG = #{row.pogFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{row.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ALLOW_SALES = #{row.allowSales,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TBL_SKU_STORE set STORE_ID = #{row.storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU_NO = #{row.skuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ID = #{row.channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKET_PRICE = #{row.marketPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, REGULAR_PRICE = #{row.regularPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, POS_AMT = #{row.posAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AVG_COST = #{row.avgCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SKU_STATUS = #{row.skuStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALLOW_RETURN = #{row.allowReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOLD_ORDER = #{row.holdOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_NO = #{row.eventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROM_EVENT_NO = #{row.promEventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAMP_EVENT_NO = #{row.stampEventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_FLAG = #{row.displayFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MD_SELECTION = #{row.mdSelection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROMOTION = #{row.promotion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUTURE_PROMOTION = #{row.futurePromotion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_SELECTION = #{row.storeSelection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POG_FLAG = #{row.pogFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{row.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALLOW_SALES = #{row.allowSales,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
